trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to a control that acts as a scrollable container for a collection of child objects.
The children of this control must implement <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider" />.
Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern>控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control can scroll horizontally.
<see langword="true" /> if the control can scroll horizontally; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果控制項可以捲動水平空間。，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can be dynamic.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以是動態的。

trans-unit.source: For example, the content area of the control might not be larger than the current viewable area, meaning <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.HorizontallyScrollable%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，內容區域的控制項可能不能大於目前的檢視區域中，意義<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.HorizontallyScrollable%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: However, either resizing the control or adding child items can increase the bounds of the content area beyond the viewable area, meaning that <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.HorizontallyScrollable%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，或是調整控制項的大小將子項目會增加內容區域的超出可檢視區域中，表示界限<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.HorizontallyScrollable%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current horizontal scroll position.
The horizontal scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the control.
trans-unit.target: 水平捲軸的位置，為總計內容區域在控制項中的百分比。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current horizontal view size.
The horizontal size of the viewable region as a percentage of the total content area within the control.
trans-unit.target: 水平大小的百分比總計內容區域在控制項中可檢視區域。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal increment specific to the control.
<see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers.NoScroll" /> should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.
The vertical increment specific to the control.
<see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers.NoScroll" /> should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.
Scrolls the visible region of the content area horizontally and vertically.

If a control supports <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount.SmallIncrement" /> values exclusively for horizontal or vertical scrolling but a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount.LargeIncrement" /> value is passed in.
An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.
The horizontal position as a percentage of the content area's total range.
<see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers.NoScroll" /> should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.
The vertical position as a percentage of the content area's total range.
<see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers.NoScroll" /> should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.
Sets the horizontal and vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the control.
This method is only useful when the content area of the control is larger than the visible region.
trans-unit.target: 只有當控制項的內容區域大於可見區域時，這個方法會有用。

trans-unit.source: Passing in the value <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers.NoScroll> indicates that there is no scrolling in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 傳入值<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers.NoScroll>表示沒有任何以指定的方向捲動。

trans-unit.source: A value that cannot be converted to a double is passed in.
A value greater than 100 or less than 0 is passed in (except -1, which is equivalent to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers.NoScroll" />).

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.HorizontalScrollPercent" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.VerticalScrollPercent" /> values are normalized to either 100 percent or 0 percent.
An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.
Gets a value that indicates whether the control can scroll vertically.
<see langword="true" /> if the control can scroll vertically; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果控制項可以捲動垂直;，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can be dynamic.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以是動態的。

trans-unit.source: For example, the content area of the control might not be larger than the viewable area meaning <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.VerticallyScrollable%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，內容區域的控制項可能不能大於可見區域意義<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.VerticallyScrollable%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: However, resizing the control or adding child items can increase the bounds of the content area beyond the viewable area, indicating that <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.VerticallyScrollable%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，調整控制項的大小，或加入子項目會增加內容區域的超出可檢視區域中，表示界限<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.VerticallyScrollable%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current vertical scroll position.
The vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the control.
trans-unit.target: 垂直捲軸的位置，為總計內容區域在控制項中的百分比。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical view size.
The vertical size of the viewable region as a percentage of the total content area within the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項內總內容區域的百分比，可檢視區域的垂直大小。
